page.title: 14Transport
page.content: Transport in our area is important.We rely on it for a number of functions ie.travel to and from shops,work, school and social engagements.We have a range of transport the most popular being the bus service.We have two main bus companies,the Ribble and the Merseyside County Council service.Both companies operate a frequent and efficient service. The train services link Liverpool to Southport and Liverpool to Ormskirk, this being a quicker way to travel. Most people own their own cars and find this the most effective way to go from A to B at anytime.Some people use their cars as taxis thus benefiting others. Our area is close to Bootle Docks and the Free Port of Liverpool.The goods imported are deposited at container bases and then moved by road and rail.
